properties.description: Whether this module should be deployed before other modules
properties.name: isBase

properties.description: The minimum instances of this VF-Module
properties.name: min_vf_module_instances

properties.description: The maximum instances of this VF-Module
properties.name: max_vf_module_instances

properties.description: The initial count of instances of the VF-Module. The value must be in the range between min_vfmodule_instances and max_vfmodule_instances. If no value provided the initial count is the min_vfmodule_instances.
properties.name: initial_count

properties.description: Alternate textual key used to reference this VF-Module model. Must be unique within the VNF model
properties.name: vf_module_label

properties.description: "true" indicates that this VF Module model requires attachment to a Volume Group. VID operator must select the Volume Group instance to attach to a VF-Module at deployment time.
properties.name: volume_group

properties.description: Identifies the set of VM types and their count included in the VF-Module
properties.name: vfc_list

properties.description: Description of the VF-modules contents and purpose (e.g. "Front-End" or "Database Cluster")
properties.name: vf_module_description

properties.description: Quantity of Availability Zones needed for this VF-Module (source: Extracted from VF-Module HEAT template)
properties.name: availability_zone_count
